page.title: 14MY BROTHER MELKSHAM
page.content: I have a little brother named Timothy. He's unlucky because he can not walk. He goes to Aloeric School. His work is OK because he is not mentally handicapped. When it snows he likes it because I pull him in the sledge. When he falls out he never cries and never really makes a fuss if he gets snow in his mouth. When it is hot outside he tries to make the most of it because when it is windy it is too cold for him. Sometimes when he's looking at my football medals I can see him becoming sad because he can't do anything like that. But he's a really good swimmer. On Fridays he goes swimming with the school to Corsham. He uses arm bands and has done 10 widths of the pool doing back stroke. The Aloeric School has a special unit to look after handicapped children.
